snippet: The construction of the $140 million contemporary art museum in downtown Los Angeles has run into “complications.”
abstract: Broad Museum in Los Angeles, designed by Diller Scofidio & Renfro to showcase Eli and Edythe Broad’s collection of contemporary art, delays opening until 2015 due to complications in creating distinctive architectural feature.
lead_paragraph: The construction of the $140 million contemporary art museum in downtown Los Angeles has run into “complications.”

headline.main: Broad Museum in Los Angeles Delays Opening Until 2015
headline.print_headline: Broad Museum in Los Angeles Delays Opening Until 2015
